alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 10:02AM EST until further notice by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Lower Roanoke River At Roanoke Rapids affecting Northampton and Halifax Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lower Roanoke River at Roanoke Rapids. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Farmlands and timberlands adjacent to the river in Roanoke Rapids flood. Property on the farmlands may be at risk from floodwaters. At 10.0 feet, The public boat ramp on Rockfish Ln in Weldon is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and continue rising to 9.3 feet tomorrow evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.9 feet on 01/13/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Lower Roanoke River Roanoke Rapids 9.0 7.7 Fri 9 am EST 9.2 9.3 9.3 9.3 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued by 1030 PM EST.this evening at 1015 PM EST.
